UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationships of the antimicrobial peptide arasin 1 - and mode of action studies of the N-terminal, proline-rich region.
Literature.Author: Paulsen VS, Blencke HM, Benincasa M, Haug T, Eksteen JJ, Styrvold OB, Scocchi M, Stensvag K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.3µM),Escherichia coli HB101(MIC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=12.5µM),Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 13032(MIC=0.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=>100µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(IC50=12.5µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(IC50=12.5µM),Botrytis cinerea 101(IC50=12.5µM)
